A

addCommand(Command) - Method in class shell.Shell
Adds a new command to the shell's commands.

C

Command - Class in shell
The abstract base class for every command class.
Command(String) - Constructor for class shell.Command
Creates a new command, and sets the command's keyword.

E

exceptions - package exceptions
 
execute(String...) - Method in class shell.Command
Specifies the behavior of the command.
exit(int) - Method in class shell.Shell
Terminates the currently running Java Virtual Machine.

F

format(String, Object...) - Method in class shell.Shell
Writes a formatted string to this object's destination using the specified format string and arguments.

G

getColumn() - Method in class shell.Result
Returns the column coordinate of the left element of the sunk ship's.
getRow() - Method in class shell.Result
Returns the row coordinate of the top element of the sunk ship's.
getSize() - Method in class shell.Result
Returns the size of the sunk ship, if it sank totally.

I

init() - Method in class shell.Shell
Initializes the shell's fields before the execution of the first command.
isHit() - Method in class shell.Result
Returns whether a shot was successful, or not.
isHorizontal() - Method in class shell.Result
Returns whether the ship sank horizontally, or not.
isSank() - Method in class shell.Result
Returns whether the last part of a ship sank, or not.

K

keyword - Variable in class shell.Command
Field for the keyword of the command.

L

load() - Static method in class shell.Loader
Returns a shell to be loaded.
Loader - Class in shell
Class for loading of the appropriate shell.
Loader() - Constructor for class shell.Loader
 

M

Main - Class in shell
The class which contains the main() method, the entry point of the application.
Main() - Constructor for class shell.Main
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class shell.Main
Loads a shell using the Loader.load() method, and then calls the shell's Shell.readEvalPrint() method to execute the specified commands as input.

N

nextLine() - Method in class shell.Shell
Advances this scanner past the current line and returns the input that was skipped.

R

readEvalPrint() - Method in class shell.Shell
Reads, evaluates the commands specified in the shell, and prints their results to the console.
Result - Class in shell
A class for storing the result of a shot.
Result(boolean, boolean, int, int, int, boolean) - Constructor for class shell.Result
 
Result(boolean) - Constructor for class shell.Result
 
resultOfShot(int, int) - Method in class shell.Shell
Returns the result of the shot at the specified cell.

S

shell - package shell
 
Shell - Class in shell
The base class for the Torpedo game's shell.
Shell() - Constructor for class shell.Shell
Creates a new Shell instance.
Status - Enum in shell
 

T

TorpedoException - Exception in exceptions
Thrown to indicate that an unadmittable thing has been done.
TorpedoException(String) - Constructor for exception exceptions.TorpedoException
 

V

Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.

Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
